name: Qtoctave
body:
### What is QtOctave?
QtOctave is a front-end for Octave. Octave is a math application similar to Matlab. Octave is a bit tricky, so QtOctave aims to make it use easier using a simple user interface.

This project was started some time ago but it was abandoned. I'm trying to update its source code. You can browse QtOctave's old website at [http://qtoctave.wordpress.com](http://qtoctave.wordpress.com)

There is a small [tutorial](http://qtoctave.files.wordpress.com/2007/03/guia_qtoctave.pdf) in spanish if needed

### Installation

First, [download](https://github.com/luisivan/QtOctave/zipball/master) QtOctave 

```
$ unzip file.zip
$ cd QtOctave
$ mkdir build
$ cd build
$ cmake ..
$ make
$ sudo make install
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
